data.actual_result: Every successive line is missing something at the beginning of the line as if something kept part of it from posting.
data.expected_result: You can see all of the multiple lines of emojis and text.
data.short_description: When using MacroWorks3.1 for Xkeys panels, Discord will remove pieces of the Macro'ed paragraphs (Multiple)
data.steps_to_repro: - Program a multi-line text macro in MacroWorks 3.1 for Xkeys 60 or 128 using text/emoji combo - Try to use the macro in the Discord Stable or PTB/Beta to post by hitting one of the macroed keys
